title: I cant play and i dont know why.

replies.body: There's the details I was looking for!  It sounds like the game is failing to render properly and causing you to crash.  This could be due to a few reasons like bad game files, drivers, or something else.  Go over each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up for good.  It's best to test it out in a custom game to prevent anymore penalties.  That should get you squared away!
